results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} (n/d)^(d-1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..6290
mathematica: a[n_]:= DivisorSum[n, (n/#)^(#-1) &]; Array[a, 30] (* _G. C. Greubel_, May 16 2018 *)
program: (PARI) N=66; x='x+O('x^N); Vec(x*deriv(-log(prod(k=1, N, (1-k*x^k)^(1/k^2))))) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 17 2019
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 15 2003
